00022 static fsal_status_t __test_access(
00023     fsal_op_context_t          * p_context,          /* IN */
00024     fsal_accessflags_t         access_type,          /* IN */
00025     fsal_attrib_list_t         * p_object_attributes   /* IN */
00026 );

00060 fsal_status_t FSAL_access(
00061     fsal_handle_t              * p_object_handle,      /* IN */
00062     fsal_op_context_t          * p_context,          /* IN */
00063     fsal_accessflags_t         access_type,          /* IN */
00064     fsal_attrib_list_t         * p_object_attributes   /* [ IN/OUT ] */
00065 ){
00066 
00067   fsal_status_t status;
00068           
00069   /* sanity checks.
00070    * note : object_attributes is optionnal in FSAL_getattrs.
00071    */
00072   if (!p_object_handle || !p_context)
00073     Return(ERR_FSAL_FAULT ,0 , INDEX_FSAL_access);
00074   
00075   /* 
00076    * If an error occures during getattr operation,
00077    * it is returned, even though the access operation succeeded.
00078    */
00079   
00080   if ( p_object_attributes ){
00081     
00082     FSAL_SET_MASK( p_object_attributes->asked_attributes, FSAL_ATTR_OWNER | FSAL_ATTR_GROUP | FSAL_ATTR_ACL | FSAL_ATTR_MODE);
00083     status = FSAL_getattrs( p_object_handle, p_context, p_object_attributes );
00084     
00085     /* on error, we set a special bit in the mask. */        
00086     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status ) )
00087     {
00088       FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( p_object_attributes->asked_attributes );
00089       FSAL_SET_MASK( p_object_attributes->asked_attributes,
00090           FSAL_ATTR_RDATTR_ERR );
00091       Return( status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_access);
00092     }
00093     
00094     status = fsal_internal_testAccess(p_context, access_type, NULL, p_object_attributes);
00095     
00096   } else { /* p_object_attributes is NULL */
00097     fsal_attrib_list_t attrs;
00098     
00099     FSAL_CLEAR_MASK( attrs.asked_attributes );
00100     FSAL_SET_MASK( attrs.asked_attributes, FSAL_ATTR_OWNER | FSAL_ATTR_GROUP | FSAL_ATTR_ACL | FSAL_ATTR_MODE);
00101 
00102     status = FSAL_getattrs( p_object_handle, p_context, &attrs );
00103     
00104     /* on error, we set a special bit in the mask. */        
00105     if ( FSAL_IS_ERROR( status ) )
00106       Return( status.major, status.minor, INDEX_FSAL_access);
00107     
00108     status = fsal_internal_testAccess(p_context, access_type, NULL, &attrs);
00109   }
00110 
00111   Return( status.major, status.minor ,INDEX_FSAL_access );
00112   
00113 }
